phase_1.title: The 'Didi' Warm-up
phase_1.text: Listen carefully, brother. Being a great driver isn't about how fast you go, it's about what you see before it happens. In this test, tap the screen the moment you see a hazard—a child, a sudden brake, or a loose stone. I'm watching your back, but you have to keep your eyes sharp. Ready? Let’s begin.

phase_2.title: The 'Vajra' Shift
phase_2.text: This Hazard Perception test isn't about speed; it's about vision. My 'Vajra' eyes will be watching how quickly you spot a developing danger. If you're distracted or trying to take shortcuts, the system will know. Professional drivers don't just react; they anticipate.
